Data: Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run full, just outside off stump, and with two slips in pace. Left alone as the ball jags away, but interestingly the ball doesn't carry to Carey
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run full, on middle, and he covers his off stump to block towards the non-striker
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs first runs! Full, outside off, and he opens the bat's face to find the gap through the point region. Two men give it a chase
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run full, on off, and the ball's coming inwards. Defended with the straight bat to mid on
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, just outside off, and defended off the back foot to mid-off
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, just outside off, and he tiptoes to flick towards mid-on
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run banged in short and aimed at the body of Dhawan, 138ks, cramps the batsman for room. Fended off to the leg side for one
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run good length and skipping away with the angle outside off, no shot from Rohit

Starc to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs Dropped by Coulter-Nile diving to his right from short midwicket. The ball bursts out of his hands. Coulter-Nile throws himself to his right and attempts the catch with his right hand - but it does not stick. Rohit has a life. Very full on the pads, chipped in the air and Rohit gets away
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run tapped towards wide mid-on for a single and Rohit gets off strike
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye very full and darting into the pads, Starc cranks up to 144ks, but no swing for him yet. Tucked away towards square leg off the back foot
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and on the hips of Rohit, 143ks, he can't put it away
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on leg stump, and Dhawan prods forward to fend
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on middle and angling across. Dhawan looks to defend, but the ball takes his outside edge. Dribbles past the slip cordon, but third man is there to clean up
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, just outside off, and he tiptoes to flick to midwicket
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball outside off, and a nice sound off his bat as he crunches a square cut. Finds Maxi at point
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, just outside off and he tries to drive. But the ball moves away, takes the outside edge and down to third man
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on middle, and tapped to the off side. Dhawan wants the single, but Rohit says no. Wise choice
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on middle, and he rides the bounce to block off the backfoot
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fullish, angling away, and he opens the bat's face to play a late cut to third man
Starc to S Dhawan, no run goes short on off, and Dhawan does well to bend his knees to sway away from the ball's line
Starc to S Dhawan, no run fuller, nearly a yorker on off, and he digs this into his boots. Dhawan wants the single, but Starc is quick to pounce on it

Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, outside off, and he flays a square cut behind point. But another excellent effort from Maxwell at point, parrying it to third man and ensuring the ball doesn't go for four
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run tries to hook but the ball isn't short enough. Length ball on leg, and Rohit already lifted his front leg to play behind square, but the ball hits his body instead
Cummins to S Dhawan, 2 runs full, on leg, and he uses his wrists to play this off his hips to midwicket. Finch gives it a chase to the boundary
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on middle, and Dhawan has no choice but to defend off his backfoot to the leg side
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run peach! Full, on middle, and Dhawan prods forward to flick to deep midwicket but the ball moves oh-so-slightly away and whizzes past his outside edge
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run back of a length, on middle, and uncomfortably blocked by Dhawan. Gloves it towards the slip region
Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs caressed! Full, outside off, and he meets the ball on the front foot, driving through the covers for four
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on the leg-stump line, and nudged to the gap behind square on the leg side for a quick run
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye full, on middle and angling into his pads. Tries to give this a whip over the leg side, but the ball hits his pads instead
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs length, on leg, and clipped off his pads to the big gap on the leg side. Zampa from fine leg runs across to intercept
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run full, on leg and swinging into his pads. Flicked to midwicket, and stopped by the fielder diving to his right
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, on middle, and he allows the bat's straight face to check-punch towards the off side
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run full, on off. Searching for the inswinger but the ball holds it's line. Driven to mid-off
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, outside off, and cut off the back foot. Finds Maxwell at point again
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on middle, and angling across. Dhawan skips backwards and punches with the bat's open face to cover
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on middle, and nudged off his pads to the leg side
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run full, on middle, and defended off the back foot to the off side. Fielder from cover comes sweeping in to stop the single

Cummins to S Dhawan, no run searing pace! Back of a length on leg, and Dhawan swivels to pull, but the ball flies just past his gloves to Carey. Finch wants to review, but Carey convinces him not to. Good call, there was no touch
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run flicked to midwicket firmly for a single
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball on the fourth-stump line outside off. Rohit defends with soft hands to the off side
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run length-ish, on middle. Dhawan check-drives to cover

Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run full, on off, and Dhawan walks across to the off side, exposing his leg-stump partly, but he ends up too close to the ball. Plays a square-drive, with minimal power, to cover point
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, FOUR runs aggressive! Length ball on middle, and Dhawan skips down the ground to muscle a straight drive through Rohit's legs for four
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 wide wayward! Tries to bowl the offcutter, but it lands way beyond leg stump and goes through to the keeper
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, FOUR runs short and wide and punished off the back foot. Drills a square cut to the boundary, and looks like Dhawan is now ready to tee off
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, FOUR runs precision! Length ball, angling away, and simply guides a cut past point and inbefore third man
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 run slower ball, on middle, and Dhawan uses his wrists to open the bat's face and steer a square cut past the diving point fielder. A touch of finesse there
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run hits him near the shoulder! Back of a length, and the ball rises quickly. Dhawan tries to pull, but the ball hurries onto him. A real skidder
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on leg, and he works this off his hips to square leg
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length ball, on off, and Rohit closes his bat's face to guide a flick to midwicket
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on off, and Dhawan walks across to the off side to block. Ball goes off his outside edge to point
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run fullish, 139kph, and he flicks this with gentle hands to the fielder at deep midwicket. Removes his bottom hand while playing that shot. Is the finger bothering him?
Cummins to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, on middle, and fended off the back foot to the bowler
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on leg stump, and Dhawan defends off the back foot. Once again takes his bottom-hand off his handle
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on middle, and Dhawan backs away to guide a late cut to third man. Preferring to play shots that use the bowler's pace instead of generating his own
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run length ball, rising delivery but Rohit punches this from chest-high to cover
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on middle, and he backs away to cut. Finds point. A pack off-side field
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run length ball outside leg stump, and Dhawan makes room - exposing all three stumps - to cut. The shot is played beyond leg stump! Crazy
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on middle, and guided to point off the back foot
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run slides on with the arm outside off, Rohit plays for some turn, but is beaten on the outside edge
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run this full one breaks into the pads of Rohit, who puts it away to deep square leg. A twirl of the wrists gives him a single
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run skids in from round the wicket, fractionally short, Dhawan jumps back and secures a single to the covers
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run short and spins back in, cramps him, fended off with the break
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller on middle and leg, worked away with the spin to square leg
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run slider on middle, Dhawan jabs his bat down on it and keeps it out
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs oh dear, way too short on leg, and Rohit waits for the ball to come to him before slogging hell-for-leather behind square on the leg-side for four
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run too full this time, a full toss on leg stump, and flicked to deep midwicket

Zampa to S Dhawan, FOUR runs length ball, on off, and he waits for the ball to come to him, before playing a late cut past short third man. Good effort from the fielder trying to get the ball back in, but the ball runs away for four anyway
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run full, on leg stump. Drilled to midwicket
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, no run full, outside off, and he comes forward to drive. Struck to mid-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, on off, and driven down the ground to long off

Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs overpitched and outside off, slower from Maxwell, Rohit allows the ball to come onto the bat. Then opens the face and eases it away wide of point. Zampa chases it hard, slides, but the ball wins the race. Top shot, opened the face and pierced the gap between point and third man like a boss
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, no run short and slides in on middle, punched off the back foot to the bowler
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run fuller and turns in as Rohit taps it away behind square on the leg side
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run short and slides in from around the stumps, punched with the angle to wide long-on
Maxwell to Rohit Sharma, 1 run arm ball from Maxwell, Rohit goes on the back foot and solidly punches the ball through the covers
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run nudged off the pads but straight to short fine leg
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pretty full on middle, but not quite driveable length, pushed down to long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run tossed up on middle, spins in, Dhawan hits it towards deep midwicket
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run Rohit uses his feet, takes a middle-stump full-toss and punches down to long-on
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan dashes down the track and drills a full ball from outside off to long-off
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs dragged down on leg stump, Rohit drops down to one knee and sweeps flat and hard to deep backward square leg
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run looped up and wide outside off, Rohit stretches out and drives to sweeper cover
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run dug in short on off, run away towards point off the back foot
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run full on middle and leg, flicked away to square leg

Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, FOUR runs hammered in short and angling across off, the steep bounce catches Dhawan unawares. He looks away, takes his eyes off the ball, and top-edges a hook and gets a four wide of fine leg
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 run short and angling across off, knocked down to third man with an open face
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and outside off, glided away towards backward point
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run short and outside off, gets on top of the bounce and rides it to point
Stoinis to S Dhawan, FOUR runs banged in short and outside off, Dhawan leaps, gets under it, and ramps it over the keeper's head, drawing applause from Kohli. Third man is squarer as opposed to finer
Stoinis to S Dhawan, no run shorter and outside off, helped to point off the back foot
Stoinis to S Dhawan, 1 run might have been a cross-seamer, holds in the pitch and bounces, skewed away behind point to third man
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run very full and outside off, punched to mid-on
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run hip-high short ball on middle, Rohit swivels on the back foot and middles a pull to deep square leg
Stoinis to S Dhawan, no run pitched up and just a shade outside off, Dhawan drives on the up but can't beat extra-cover, and that's drinks
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs dug in short and outside off, angling in towards the left shoulder of Rohit. He jumps back and pulls in the air to the right of deep square leg for a maximum
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and outside off, punched to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run Rohit rides the bounce of this short ball outside off and dinks it down to third man
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 run short at the body, tucked to the leg side for one
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run short and on off, this slower ball is defended off the back foot
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, 1 run tip and run to the left of short cover. Dhawan and Rohit take on Smith's arm and complete the single
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run slower offcutter, finishes on off, Rohit presses forward and defensively drops the ball to the leg side
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run thigh-high short ball on the leg stump, Rohit keeps back and swats a pull away to deep fine leg
Stoinis to S Dhawan, 2 runs Dhawan jumps across off, gets closer to this full ball outside off and punches with an open face behind point, to the right of sweeper

Stoinis to S Dhawan, 1 run full-toss on leg and middle, bunted to mid-off and Rohit responds swiftly enough for a single. Dhawan celebrates his half-century, plenty of smiles in the Indian dressing room
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and angling in, turned with the incoming angle behind square on the leg side for a single
Stoinis to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan races down the track. Short and wide outside off, Dhawan reaches out for the ball and smears it away to sweper cover
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run dug in short on off, Dhawan leaps and fends it to point with soft hands
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length and angling across off, fended behind to the keeper
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length and too straight, tucked to deep midwicket
Starc to S Dhawan, no run short on middle, Dhawan hops and fends to point
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run short on the hips, 140ks, worked behind square on the leg side
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run slower cutter on leg stump, tucked around the corner as Rohit and Dhawan bring up another century opening stand
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, no run good length on middle, defended to the leg side
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run Rohit leans back and cuts a short ball from outside off to backward point, where Maxwell dives, fumbles, and gives up a single
Stoinis to S Dhawan, FOUR runs dug in short and aimed at the shoulder of Dhawan, he swivels on the back foot and pulls to the fine leg boundary

Stoinis to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Wow, this is a stunning stroke from Dhawan. Pitched up and outside off, Dhawan stretches out and shovels it away with the bottom hand over extra-cover. Skims away to the fence. Shot of the day so far
Stoinis to S Dhawan, 1 run
Stoinis to Rohit Sharma, 1 run pitched up and outside off, driven through the line to sweeper cover
Starc to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs short, wide, Rohit rocks back and nails a cut to the point boundary. Rohit joins Dhawan in getting to a fifty
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs on a length and angling across off, punched away to the right of sweeper cover
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs on the pads, clipped away wide of midwicket. Rohit hares back for the second
Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short and outside of, Rohit jumps on top of the ball and crunches to sweeper
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run yorker on leg stump, jabbed away to deep midwicket

Zampa to S Dhawan, 2 runs length ball, outside off, and bends his knees to get his eyes on the ball's level. Cuts past point, but the fielder in the deep - Coulter-Nile - slides across the ground to stop the boundary
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on middle, and flicked off his pads to deep midwicket
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run zipping into Rohit, and he pulls this off the back foot to deep midwicket
Zampa to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on leg, and the googly is punched off the back foot to the bowler
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run full, on middle, and nudged off his toes to deep midwicket for a walking single
Zampa to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, outside off, and pushed with the bat's open face to deep extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run
Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, no run full, on off, and flicked off his toes to midwicket. Soft hands

Coulter-Nile to Rohit Sharma, OUT first wicket! Length ball outside off, rising off the deck, and Rohit tries fishing for it. Takes the outside edge, and Carey moves swiftly to his left right to half-dive and complete the catch
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full outside off, and left alone
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run full, on his pads, and worked to the leg side
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run length ball, wide outside off again, and Kohli is happy to let it go
Zampa to S Dhawan, 2 runs full, on middle, and skidding through. Dhawan comes down the wicket and lifts it over Zampa. Could've been out to long-off it he hadn't hit it that straight
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run
Zampa to Kohli, no run full, on off and the googly is met by Kohli on the front foot. Tapped towards the leg side
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run full outside off, and he drives the legbreak to extra cover
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball on middle, and the googly spins wildly away. Dhawan goes onto the back foot and punches to long off
Zampa to Kohli, no run overpitched on middle, nearly a yorker. Dug away to mid on

Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on leg, and he tries to flick square. Ball hits some part of Dhawan and flies down the leg side, but Carey jumps to his right to take a one-handed catches. Will Australia review? Nah, that came off his hip
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 run full, on middle, and driven confidently away from his body to extra cover
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run back of a length outside off, rolling his fingers over this ball. Punched to cover after tiptoeing
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run length ball, on middle and angling away. Guided off the back foot to point
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on off, and he caresses a back-foot punch to mid-off
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run length ball, wide outside off, and cut square off the back foot to deep point
Zampa to Kohli, no run full, outside off, and defended to mid off
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run too wide outside off, forcing Virat to reach. He slaps a square drive to Cummins at deep extra cover
Zampa to S Dhawan, FOUR runs full, outside off, and Dhawan takes a huge stride to meet the ball. Hammers a square drive in front of the fielder at cover, and the ball has raced away to the fence
Zampa to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on middle, and flicked to the leg side
Zampa to Kohli, 1 run full outside off stump, and he opens the bat's face to guide a shot to deep point
Zampa to S Dhawan, FOUR runs full, on middle, and he skips down the wicket to lift a shot over mid-on. Nonchalantly done, races away to the wide long-on boundary
Cummins to Kohli, no run
Cummins to Kohli, no run length ball, outside off, and he flays a shot to cover. Mistimed
Cummins to Kohli, no run full, on off, and he drives off the front foot to mid-on
Cummins to Kohli, 1 wide length ball, on middle, and angling down leg. Virat is furious at himself for missing out on a pull
Cummins to Kohli, FOUR runs slapped over point! Full, very wide outside off, and Virat's fast hands sends the ball over point. Third man not quick enough
Cummins to Kohli, 1 run length ball, outside off, and punched square to deep point
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run back of a length on middle, and a bit of spongy bounce takes the ball over Dhawan's blade while he tries to ramp it over Carey. Smart take from the keeper
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run length ball, outside off stump, and with no turn. Punched past the non-striker to mid-on
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run Maxwell coming around the wicket. Length ball angling in from outside off, and he plays a grounded pull shot to deep midwicket
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run length ball, outside off and turning in. Kohli backs away to make room, and punches down the ground to long on
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run full, on middle, and defended with gentle hands to Maxwell
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run length ball outside off, and he bends his knees to cut. Finds Smith at point though
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run full, on leg, and nudged away to short fine leg. Kohli scampers across to the other end, and is safe despite a solid throw
Cummins to S Dhawan, 2 runs length ball, outside off, and slapped past deep extra cover. They jog back for the second
Cummins to S Dhawan, no run full, on off, and he mistimes a drive to mid-off. They choose not to run

Cummins to S Dhawan, FOUR runs back of a length, on middle, and Dhawan sways to ramp a shot over the keeper. Instead it takes the edge of his bat and flies past Carey's left instead. Moves into the nineties
Cummins to S Dhawan, 1 run length ball, on middle, and he mistimes a cut to point
Cummins to Kohli, no run length ball, outside off, and fended off the back foot to point
Cummins to Kohli, no run length ball outside off, and he prods onto the front foot for a drive. Can't beat the infield
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run full, on off, and angling in. Flicked to short midwicket
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run full, on middle, and straightening after pitching. Tapped off the front foot to cover
Maxwell to S Dhawan, FOUR runs slow, half-tracker on middle, and Dhawan ain't missing out. Rocks deep and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run length ball, outside off and turning inwards. Cut square to the sweeper-fielder on the off side
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run full, on off, and defended with soft hands to cover

Stoinis to Kohli, 2 runs full outside off, and he drives with the bat's open face. Flies off his edge and races down to third man after a misfield at point. Maxwell - at point - is disappointed with his own fielding effort
Stoinis to Kohli, no run full, just outside off, and he takes a big stride forward to defend
Stoinis to Kohli, 2 runs full outside off and he throws his hands at this. Not as flawless as classical Kohli, this drive
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run length ball outside off, and he steers a late cut to third man
Stoinis to S Dhawan, 1 run back of a length on middle, and pulled along the ground to deep midwicket
Stoinis to Kohli, 2 runs length ball, on off, and flicked off his pads to the fielder at deep midwicket. As the commentator on TV says, they've pinched eight runs off the over with zero risk
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run on a length and outside off, non-turner, patted into the covers for one
Maxwell to Kohli, no run fuller and turns in on middle, Kohli drops it square on the leg side
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run Kohli stretches out and bunts a single to deep midwicket
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run back of a length and slides on off, poked back to the bowler
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run shorter and outside off, Dhawan goes on the back foot and flays the ball to sweeper
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run shorter and turns in on the stumps, Kohli stands up tall and forces the ball down to long-on

Stoinis to Kohli, FOUR runs just short of a good length and outside off, Kohli sits back and short-arm jabs it in the air, hits it to the left of midwicket and right of mid-on. Top shot from a top batsman
Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run shorter and outside off, pulled to the right of midwicket
Stoinis to S Dhawan, no run might full on off, Dhawan presses forward and squirts the ball to the left of short cover

Stoinis to S Dhawan, 1 run Dhawan is on 99. Dhawan is nervous. There's a mix-up between the wickets, and there's a direct hit. Kohli dishes out a full-stretch dive at the non-striker's end and is safe. Kohli and Dhawan exchange wry smiles. Then comes Dhawan's trademark celebration. Stoinis to Kohli, 1 run flapped through midwicket for one
Stoinis to S Dhawan, 1 wide bouncer, sails over the head, as Dhawan sways out of the way. Wide called
Stoinis to S Dhawan, no run yorker on leg stump, jammed back to Stoinis
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run flatter and fuller on middle and leg, Kohli shovels it down to long-on with the bottom hand
Maxwell to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Dhawan dashes down the track, manufactures a leg-stump half-volley and hoists it over midwicket
Maxwell to S Dhawan, no run Dhawan backs away outside leg, fetches this full one from outside off and belts it to cover

Maxwell to S Dhawan, FOUR runs tossed on middle, Dhawan stays leg-side of the ball. He can't get to this pitch, but still manages to collapse his back leg and loft it inside-out over extra-cover. Exquisite shot
Maxwell to S Dhawan, 1 run fired on the pads, nurdled to the leg side for one
Maxwell to Kohli, 1 run short on middle and leg from round the stumps, forced off the back foot through midwicket
Starc to Kohli, 1 run short and angling across off, punched to point, where Maxwell fumbles and gives up another single
Starc to S Dhawan, no run short on off, Dhawan stays leg-side of the ball and cracks it to cover
Starc to S Dhawan, 2 runs dug in short on off, Dhawan thinks about a pull but bails out at the last moment. He checks his shot and instead glides it to third man
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run short one again outside off, this holds up in the pitch, Dhawan ramps again over the keeper's head. Smartly done again
Starc to Kohli, no run back of a length on off, played back to Starc
Starc to Kohli, 1 run Kohli jumps across off and tucks a single to deep square leg
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run fullish and outside off, punchily driven down to long-off
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, 1 leg bye short on leg stump, rushes Dhawan into a hook, flapped away behind square on the leg side
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, no run short and outside off, Kohli leans back and punches to point, where Maxwell swoops down on the ball this time
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, FOUR runs banged in on off, 135ks, Kohli pulls off the front foot and puts it away to the midwicket fence
Coulter-Nile to Kohli, 1 run shorter and outside off, swatted away in front of square on the leg side for one
Coulter-Nile to S Dhawan, no run short on middle, NCN seems Dhawan stepping out and digs it into the middle of the track. Dhawan swings for the hills... and misses. The ball bounces over the stumps
Starc to Kohli, 1 run full and sprayed on the pads, picked away neatly to deep midwicket by Kohli
Starc to S Dhawan, FOUR runs Starc just misses his yorker, overpitches it slightly on middle. Dhawan opens up his stance and hips, belting it past the bowler's outstretched left hand for four
Starc to S Dhawan, no run back of a length and swerves away outside off as Dhawan stays leg-side of the ball and does not connect
Starc to S Dhawan, 1 run short and outside off, Dhawan forces a pull to deep midwicket
Starc to Kohli, 1 run short and angling across off, guided away to the left of backward point and right of deep third man

Kuldeep to Khawaja, no run length ball outside off, and cut off the back foot to point

India won by 36 runs
